author: Special Correspondent
text:
Fire that erupted in a textile unit at Rasampalayam near Manickampalayam in Erode destroyed machinery and other materials on Tuesday.

A fire that erupted on Tuesday morning in a textile unit near Manickampalayam in the city destroyed machinery and fabric reportedly worth lakhs of rupees.

A gas cylinder that exploded due to the impact damaged the asbestos roofing, according to District Fire Officer in-charge Saravanan.

Four Fire tenders were pressed into service and a team of 18 personnel doused the fire in an operation lasting about three hours, he said.
title: Fire destroys machinery, fabric
